siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
blogPost.body: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
blogPost.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.
blogPost.author: Saber Chaabani

localize.description: 递归是一款关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。这是一个完美的游戏，喜欢困难的谜题的人。你的目标是帮助小机器人收集所有的宝石，找到正确的模式，并将其转化为一个简短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一个关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。

localize.description: 遞歸是一款關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。這是一個完美的遊戲，喜歡困難的謎題的人。你的目標是幫助小機器人收集所有的寶石，找到正確的模式，並將其轉化爲一個簡短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一個關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。

previous.excerpt: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
previous.title: Still - An app to help relieve symptoms of anxiety & OCD

localize.description: Still旨在帮助你缓解焦虑和强迫症的症状。利用有针对性的信息帮助您将注意力从焦虑或强迫症中拉出来，以及呼吸练习，Still帮助您避免最糟糕的状况，并阻止它的发生。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助缓解焦虑和强迫症症状的应用程序。

localize.description: Still旨在幫助你緩解焦慮和強迫症的症狀。利用有針對性的信息幫助您將注意力從焦慮或強迫症中拉出來，以及呼吸練習，Still幫助您避免最糟糕的狀況，並阻止它的發生。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助緩解焦慮和強迫症症狀的應用程序。

next.excerpt: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!
next.title: RapidReg LTD - Forms, bookings & scheduler with no limits that plants trees

localize.description: RapidReg - 一个日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一个地方，在一个价格你不能打！注册，表格和调查问卷建立，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款。注册，表格和调查建设者，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款，并去绿色种植的树木!
localize.tagline: 表格，预订和无限制的日程安排，植树。

localize.description: RapidReg - 一個日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一個地方，在一個價格你不能打！註冊，表格和調查問卷建立，可用性日曆和在線預訂，定價和付款。註冊，表格和調查建設者，可用性日曆和在線預訂，定價和付款，並去綠色種植的樹木!
localize.tagline: 表格，預訂和無限制的日程安排，植樹。
